price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߜߊ߬ߟߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ ߞߍߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
